alert.note: Alert for Bradley; Calhoun; Union (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 10:52AM CST until January 13 at 1:12AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Arkansas... Ouachita River At Thatcher L&D affecting Calhoun, Union and Bradley Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ouachita River At Thatcher L&D. * WHEN...Until early Friday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM CST Tuesday the stage was 81.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Wednesday evening and continue falling to 77.0 feet Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 79.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecast 12 PM Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Crest Time Date Ouachita River Thatcher L&D 79.0 81.6 Tue 9 AM 79.6 77.6 77.0 **FALLING** &&
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. River forecasts are based on current conditions and rainfall forecasted to occur over the next 24 hours. During periods of flooding...Evening forecasts are reissued with updated rainfall forecasts. Observed and forecasted stage data plots are available on our Advanced Hydrologic Prediction Service web page at... www.weather.gov/lzk Under the Current Conditions section...Select River and Lakes AHPS.
